responsibilities: Partner with Analysts, Data Scientists, Data Engineers, and decision makers on data solutions
Translate use cases, pain points, and success criteria into technical requirements
Develop and upgrade data pipelines and self-service tooling to provide clean, efficient results
Automate manual processes to improve efficiency across multiple data teams
Implement data governance through documentation, observability, and controls
skills: Proficiency in at least one BI reporting tool (Looker/LookML, Tableau, Chartio)
Knowledge of tools for data storage and access (BigQuery, Postgres, Presto, Redshift)
Experience with pipeline management and orchestration (Airflow, dbt)
Experience authoring and orchestrating ETL jobs
Skills in building visualizations for self-service datasets, metrics, and insights
qualifications: 2+ years full-time industry experience in a technical data or analytics role
Experience working with business and engineering partners
